name: 2025 the 10th International Conference on Cloud Computing and Big Data Analytics
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers will be included in ICCCBDA 2025 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. ICCCBDA 2025 is listed in IEEE Conference List: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/64898 Journal Recommendation: Selected paper will be recommended and invited to publish an extended version on the following journals. Please make sure you have added at least 30% of a new contents.| Human-Centric Intelligent Systems: Indexing: EBSCO, Baidu, CLOCKSS, CNKI, CNPIEC, DBLP, Dimensions, Google Scholar, etc...
organizers: Sichuan Institute of Electronics and IEEE
